item.title: Bluegrass playlist for 12/2016
item.description: Including: Becky Buller, Bryan Sutton & Roy Curry, Chris Thile, I Don'T Know, Lonzo & Oscar, Lonzo And Oscar, Seldom Scene, The Barrel Boys, The Mountain Ramblers, The Peregrines.
